name: Connect Four + (Pompmaker1)
description:
Connect four with a twist! The game does not end when a player connects a line of four!

Instead, those pieces disappear and the player earns points! Pieces above will fall down to fill in the gap, potentially connecting more lines and scoring points for other players!

Connect longer lines for more points! Get to a certain number of points to win!

Supports up to 8 players with a maximum gameboard size of 30x30!
